headline: Simon Property Group, Inc. (SPG) Achieves Record Real Estate Funds from Operations and Approves Quarterly Dividend
summary: Simon Property Group, Inc. (NYSE:SPG) is one of Goldman Sachs’ top REIT stock picks. On February 6, JPMorgan analyst Michael Mueller raised the price target for Simon Property Group, Inc. (NYSE:SPG) to $210 from $198 while maintaining a Neutral rating, updating the company’s model following its Q4 report. On February 2, Simon Property Group, Inc. […]

headline: Copley Place™, Boston's Premier Luxury Shopping and Dining Destination, Announces Landmark Redevelopment
summary: Simon®, a real estate investment trust engaged in the ownership of premier shopping, dining, entertainment and mixed-use destinations, today announced a transformational redevelopment of the current Neiman Marcus space at Copley PlaceTM. This next chapter elevates the center's distinctive luxury retail mix and further cements Copley Place as the definitive destination for luxury shopping and dining in Boston.

content.title: Copley Place™, Boston's Premier Luxury Shopping and Dining Destination, Announces Landmark Redevelopment
content.summary: Simon®, a real estate investment trust engaged in the ownership of premier shopping, dining, entertainment and mixed-use destinations, today announced a transformational redevelopment of the current Neiman Marcus space at Copley PlaceTM. This next chapter elevates the center's distinctive luxury retail mix and further cements Copley Place as the definitive destination for luxury shopping and dining in Boston.
